derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from seduction, on the pattern of pairs such as induction, inductive

entry.tran: 非常吸引人的;诱惑的;有魅力的
entry.def: Something that is seductive is very attractive or makes you want to do something that you would not otherwise do.

example.tran: 这是一个非常吸引人的论点。

entry.def: A person who is seductive is very attractive sexually.

example.ex: I love dressing up to look seductive.
example.tran: 我喜欢打扮得性感一些。

means.word_mean: 1. tending to entice into a desired action or state
